Sentencas: A novel copper-based anode for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells was prepared through the conventional ceramic technology and using CuO and SDC (Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9) powders with controlled particle size.
Titulo: Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The new Cu-SDC anode also contained highly dispersed CeO2 and Ni particles to increase its surface area and fuel cell performance.
Titulo: Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The specific surface area of the Cu-SDC bare anode, CeO2 and Ni-dispersed phases were estimated to be 1.53, 39.4 and 86.4 m(2) g(-1), respectively.
Titulo: Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells having the new anode were tested for both humid hydrogen and methane.
Titulo: Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte
Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: 250 mW cm(-2) were achieved in H-2 at 600 degrees C and in CH4 700 degrees C, even if the SDC-electrolyte supporting membrane was 250-mu m thick.
Titulo: Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: Short term stability tests (maximum 64 11) showed an initial impairment, but not dramatic, of the new anode performance and the formation of carbon deposits.
Titulo: Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte

Sentencas: The addition of MoOx to the new anode did not prevent the formation of carbon deposits.
Titulo: Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte
Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte
Novel copper-based anodes for solid oxide fuel cells with samaria-doped ceria electrolyte
